title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: 1.Technology Entrepreneurship (EP 60022) Introduction to the general theories, principles, concepts and practices of technology entrepreneurship, Feasibility analysis for B- plans, Intrapreneurship and its interactions with high technology, Networking of entrepreneurial activities for creation, launching, managing and exiting of a technology innovation based product/service entrepreneurship
